meanings.sent1: The teacher's favored student always gets to line up first.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses her favored color for painting.
meanings.sent3: The cat's favored toy is the one with the jingling bell.
meanings.sent4: The favored route to the beach is along the scenic coastal road.
meanings.sent5: The favored dessert at the restaurant is the chocolate lava cake.

meanings.sent1: The favored candidate won the election by a large margin.
meanings.sent2: The team's favored strategy led them to victory.
meanings.sent3: The favored idea for the project was met with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The favored movie star received an award for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent5: The favored charity received a generous donation from a local business.

meanings.definition: Having a special advantage or benefit
meanings.sent1: The favored team had the home-field advantage in the championship game.
meanings.sent2: Being the boss's daughter, she was always the favored one in the office.
meanings.sent3: The favored parking spot near the entrance was always taken first.
meanings.sent4: The favored treatment at the spa included a relaxing massage and facial.
meanings.sent5: The favored customer received a discount on their next purchase.
